name: Decades Lost
description:
An ode to my favorite game devs! Lost Decade Games has been an awesome influence in my life, and I hopefully captured some of their essence in this top down 3/4ths overhead adventure!

I did all the art in MSPaint using piskelapp.com to provide transparency. All my code was written by me in "vanilla" html5 javascript and only tested in chrome.

If you don't already you should listen to their podcast lostcast!:
lostdecadegames.com/lostcast/episodes/

This game for the most part is themed after the podcast, so yeah listen to it!

And just remember, never give into your doubts, always keep trying to achieve whatever it is you are passionate about.

I hope you enjoy!

-Vox

Follow LDG at these places:
http://www.lostdecadegames.com
gamedevtreasure.com
youtube.com/user/lostdecadegames
twitter.com/LostDecadeGames
